mailBody: The total revenue of JPMorgan Chase for the year 2023 was 162.4 billion dollars. Notable changes in revenue compared to previous periods include a record revenue of 162.4 billion dollars in 2023, marking the sixth consecutive year of record revenue. Total net revenue increased to 158.1 billion dollars in 2023, compared to 128.7 billion dollars in 2022 and 121.6 billion dollars in 2021, reflecting strong performance across its businesses and continued growth in market share in several areas.
